0.Pros: Literally no pros besides it looks okay on my resume. There was also free food while I was working and that was nice.
0.Cons: Pay was terrible for an outrageous amount of work. Constantly promised raises and received nothing.

1.Pros: Working with the owner operators and learning about the restaurant operations was a great experience. The amount of support for your job McDonald's offers helps through the busy days. The health benefits are the best.
1.Cons: The length and quantity of meetings you are required to attend is obsessive and can hold you back from being the best at your job.

2.Pros: Great environment, learn customer service skills, learn cash handling experience
2.Cons: Low pay, management, and demanding schedules at times

3.Pros: It was really cool with cool employees. Good benefits also
3.Cons: Did not like being around food. Bad customer service

4.Cons: Everything is a nightmare working there

5.Pros: My employees were great! No real positives about this location.
5.Cons: Franchise owner was outdated. Didn't keep up with new McDonald's technology. Forced changes in inventory against system recommendations and ended up buying nuggets and bunsecured from walmart!!

6.Pros: Hours, no free food other stuff that they don't like you to fo
6.Cons: Paid, use money buy stuff and chill

7.Pros: It's easy to get days off, and works with my school schedule so that I get decent hours for the week.
7.Cons: Rushes are bad and frequent, and the work ethic of your coworkers will make or break how well your shift goes.

8.Pros: Mcdonalds was good as a first job and i think that the pay was decent, would onyl consider for first job
8.Cons: the food kind of started to gross me out after a while but it was good while it lasted

9.Pros: Teaches you how to deal with people, & teaches you good customer service! It's a very good first job. Plus you get 50% off everything! You can spend up to $20
9.Cons: Some customers are really rude lol just don't let your emotions get the best of you, keep a positive attitude no matter how difficult the customer! & Also sometimes it could get really messy in the Kitchen kind of gross.You may also gain weight if you eat a lot lol
